about.summary: Python wrapper for the NCI Chemical Identifier Resolver (CIR).

name: cirpy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "CIRpy" %}
{% set version = "1.0.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "b08c1483779e1c8fa6a5da7e383138a33e8396b31f56d827a3bca7c83e689c16" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv "
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - python
    - lxml
test:
  imports:
    - cirpy

about:
  home: "https://github.com/mcs07/CIRpy"
  license: "MIT"
  license_family: "MIT"
  license_file: "LICENSE.txt"
  summary: "Python wrapper for the NCI Chemical Identifier Resolver (CIR)."
  doc_url: "https://cirpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/"
  dev_url: "https://github.com/mcs07/CIRpy"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - thompsonsed
